title: Fix ProfileSetupModal background to solid white/dark

requirements.text: Update ProfileSetupModal.tsx so the modal overlay uses a solid dark background (e.g. rgba(0,0,0,0.85) or bg-gray-900) and the modal card itself uses a solid white background (#FFFFFF) with navy (#0A1F44) text. Remove any semi-transparent or translucent background styles that cause the underlying page content to show through the modal, making the form fields and labels unreadable.

quotes: see screenshot clearly onboarding from (name class,contact number) filling section now visible so please keep dark white solid background for this

acceptanceCriteria: The modal overlay behind the ProfileSetupModal card is fully opaque dark (no page content visible through it).
The modal card has a solid white (#FFFFFF) background — no transparency or blur effect.
All form labels (Full Name, Class, Contact Number), input fields, validation messages, and the Save & Continue button are clearly readable against the solid white card.
The modal appearance is consistent on both desktop and mobile viewports.
No underlying home page content bleeds through the modal card or its overlay.

constraints: Do not modify any file under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
Do not alter the ProfileSetupModal form fields, validation logic, or backend submission flow — only fix the background/styling.
nonGoals: Redesigning the ProfileSetupModal layout or form structure.
Modifying any other page or component.
